page.title: 02Rawmarsh area news : 24-5-85
page.content:
{Politics } Rawmarsh athlete{Peter {Elliot}has decided not to defend his U.K. Championship title because of threats made by the I.R.A. to British sportsmen who compete in Ireland. Peter, aged 22, said his family were concerned by the threats made earlier in the year.
{Crime } Police have increased patrols in order to try to curb an outbreak of violence and crime which is damaging a local shopping precinct. The precinct in{Swinton}has been vandalised for six weeks and pensioners and traders are living under a constant threat.
{Industry} It was announced this week that Â£4m is to be invested in{British {Steel, Rotherham.}This will finance a two-year development programme at Aldwarke and Templeborough.
